Headline: #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd. Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Catalpa Ave
ShortDescription: 54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd. buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Pulaski, Peterson and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Catalpa Ave.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Pulaski, Peterson and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Catalpa Ave.

Allow extra travel time.
